desc: 観賞用としての愛好家もいるほど美しい模様をした獣の皮

dictionary.lore: This is an extremely rare scarlet-colored pelt. Not only is it tough, but the pattern is so beautiful that some collectors even put it on display. It has also historically been used as a material for banners. It's extremely rare now, however, and only found around the Shrine of Lystia and the Destroyed Temple.

name: 豪朱の皮
